label: 神尾春央
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: The finance magistrate in 1749 when the shogunate increased its tax levies, [who is known to have] compared the peasants to sesame seeds:  The harder you squeeze them, the more you can extract from them" (pp. 494-5)."
